descriptions:
['DescriptionOverlooking the famous Montgomerie golf course, this spectacular Vastu compliant villa in Emirates Hills is one of its kind. Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties is proud to present this carefully designed family home. Built on a large plot of 21,000 sq.ft. with a built up of 23,000 sq.ft. Each aspect of the villa has been designed to detail with quality and exclusive materials. A grand drive-in from the northeast entrance, luscious gardens with a pool on the front of the villa gives the property a Mediterranean look.   
Neutral warm colours with contract of Brazilian walnut woodworks flow through the property. The rear of the property has an enclosed outdoor seating for family brunches and lazy afternoons or evenings for entertaining and relaxing, over looking the beautiful green golf course. 
Property has a basement with entertainment area, sitting room, library/office and staff quarters. The ground floor has informal and formal living spaces, a cozy bar, kitchen and the guest suites. 
The first floor has two family area with 4 bedrooms including the grand master suite and prayer room. The double height ceiling has a modern blown glass chandelier hanging all the way to the ground floor. The house has a plenty of sunlight dancing through and one can see the lovely landscaped gardens. 
The rooftop has a terrace covered with Faux grass, a water features a solarium with breathtaking 360 degree views of the city and the golf course. 
For a private viewing of the property, please call us on +971504127168 to make this your family home.']

['DescriptionA stunning find in a spectacular project by Meraas. This 1BR is located on a high floor in one of the best buildings in Bluewaters.
Located in Building 7, which is one of the buildings directly framing Ain Dubai, with full, open views of the sea and right on the main retail and F & B area of Bluewaters Island.
Secure a property in Dubai s latest mega-project that is the city island retreat right off JBR. This is a great investment opportunity to purchase exclusive, luxury real estate within a world-class entertainment district. As an end-user, you will own an extremely liquid asset, that will be ready to sell or put up for lease at any time.
What makes Bluewaters Island such a great project to invest in?
It is a federal project that hosts the largest observation in the world! Only 10 residential buildings have been developed on the island, which makes the project very unique, limited and desirable. The low and controlled supply of residences increases the value of your investment here, along with access to 200 retail & dining concepts on the island, the world-famous Caesars Palace and direct pedestrian crossing to JBR.
This brand-new 1BR that comes with:
* Open plan, modern living space
* Floor-to-ceiling windows for full sea views and natural sunlight
* Bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms
* Fully equipped kitchen with new appliances
* Fine finishing with wooden flooring, soft metallic fixtures, Italian sanitary ware and minimalistic style
* Private parking
* Three modes of transport into and out of the island, with direct SZR access!
As a Bluewaters specialist I can also show you a number of properties available in this incredible project by Meraas. A developer well-known for bringing creative living concepts to life.

descriptions: ['DescriptionAn immaculate and beautifully maintained studio is now available for sales at DEC Towers in Dubai Marina. This large and spacious studio on the 2nd floor of the podium comes with a balcony and one allocated parking in the basement.\xa0The studio can be bought in bulk, 3 studios for 1.5 mln or singularly for 500k aed.\xa0Bright and spacious with a closed separate kitchen with white goods.The studio has been fully maintained by the current owner.\xa0The building facilities include a tennis court, gymnasium,\xa0 swimming pool and a jogging track.\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0Easy access to the Jumeirah Beach, restaurants, hotels, pubs, and cafes.\xa0 The largest man-made marina in the world, towering skyscrapers, waterfront apartments and a myriad of restaurants, make Dubai Marina an enchanting destination. Take a stroll along the waterfront promenade better known as Dubai Marina Walk, dine at any of the fine restaurants along the strip or gaze at the multi-million-dirham yachts moored along the marina.']
